infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: We use notifications to remind you to follow up with your leads.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We need access to your microphone to record voice notes for lead activities.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: We need access to your contacts to save leads directly to your phone's contact list.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Close With Mario to access your photos to upload a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Close With Mario to use your camera to take a profile picture.
